These rallies occurred amidst criticism of the interim government's handling of law and order, marking increased political activity as the anniversary of Sheikh Hasina's ouster approaches.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/protests-mark-hasinas-exit-anniversary-student-led-party-rallies-in-dhaka-calls-for-new-constitution/articleshow/123078902.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/protests-mark-hasinas-exit-anniversary-student-led-party-rallies-in-dhaka-calls-for-new-constitution/articleshow/123078902.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 22:30:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1440066" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123078973,imgsize-1440066.cms"/></item><item><title>How much crude does India get from Russia & will it stop after US penalty threat?</title><description><![CDATA[India faces potential US penalties due to its continued trade relations with Russia, specifically regarding oil and defence equipment purchases. The EC clarified that the SIR exercise hasn't been rolled out in Tamil Nadu yet, making the connection to Bihar's voter list absurd. Chidambaram had questioned the addition of 6.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/misleading-baseless-ec-fact-checks-p-chidambarams-migrant-voters-claim-warns-against-politicising-sir/articleshow/123076309.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/misleading-baseless-ec-fact-checks-p-chidambarams-migrant-voters-claim-warns-against-politicising-sir/articleshow/123076309.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 18:17:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="485141" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076313,imgsize-485141.cms"/></item><item><title>Bill Gates: AI today can replace human work; but it is not …</title><description><![CDATA[Bill Gates believes AI is rapidly advancing, capable of handling simple coding tasks but not yet the most complex ones. Gates highlights AI's potential to replace telesales jobs, impacting various sectors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/bill-gates-says-ai-today-can-replace-human-work-the-most-complex-coding-tasks-but-it-is-not-/articleshow/123068497.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/bill-gates-says-ai-today-can-replace-human-work-the-most-complex-coding-tasks-but-it-is-not-/articleshow/123068497.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:25:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43122" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123068513,imgsize-43122.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Part of Patna flyover sinks; was inaugurated 2 months ago</title><description><![CDATA[A section of Patna's new double-deck flyover has sunk. This happened after persistent heavy rainfall. The flyover cost Rs 422 crore. Nitish Kumar, Bihar's Chief Minister, inaugurated it on June 11, 2025. The structure spans the busy Ashok Rajpath. Residents face flooding due to poor drainage. The flyover aimed to reduce congestion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-rs-422-crore-patna-double-deck-flyover-sinks-after-heavy-rainfall-structure-was-inaugurated-just-2-months-ago/articleshow/123078399.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-rs-422-crore-patna-double-deck-flyover-sinks-after-heavy-rainfall-structure-was-inaugurated-just-2-months-ago/articleshow/123078399.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 21:44:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="763845" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123078467,imgsize-763845.cms"/></item><item><title>Kolkata shocker: Man dies by suicide fearing deportation to Bangladesh over NRC</title><description><![CDATA[Dilip Kumar Saha, a 63-year-old Kolkata resident, was found dead in his home, with his family attributing his suicide to fears of deportation due to the potential implementation of the National Register of Citizens (NRC).]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kolkata-shocker-man-dies-by-suicide-fearing-deportation-to-bangladesh-over-nrc-family-says-he-fled-dhaka-in-1972-had-all-papers/articleshow/123077493.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kolkata-shocker-man-dies-by-suicide-fearing-deportation-to-bangladesh-over-nrc-family-says-he-fled-dhaka-in-1972-had-all-papers/articleshow/123077493.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 20:24:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46836" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077648,imgsize-46836.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Joe Root equals Sunil Gavaskar, breaks multiple records in The Oval masterclass vs India</title><description><![CDATA[Joe Root's magnificent 39th Test century propelled England closer to their target against India at The Oval. This was Root's 13th ton against India, the most by any batter.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-joe-root-equals-sunil-gavaskar-breaks-multiple-records-in-the-oval-masterclass-vs-india/articleshow/123078267.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-joe-root-equals-sunil-gavaskar-breaks-multiple-records-in-the-oval-masterclass-vs-india/articleshow/123078267.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 21:30:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123078178,imgsize-133386.cms"/></item><item><title>Culture shift at Google: CEO Sundar Pichai to employees; ‘I think we have to…’</title><description><![CDATA[Google's CEO Sundar Pichai and executives like Brian Saluzzo are urging employees to accelerate the integration of AI into their workflows, aiming for increased productivity and efficiency. This push includes internal AI tools like Cider and training programs developed with DeepMind, such as "Building with Gemini," to enhance software engineers' capabilities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-employees-i-think-we-have-to-accomplish-more/articleshow/123051998.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-employees-i-think-we-have-to-accomplish-more/articleshow/123051998.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:20:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="18668" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123052356,imgsize-18668.cms"/></item><item><title>Semiconductor mission: How India is stepping up its chip revolution</title><description><![CDATA[India is rapidly transforming its semiconductor industry with strong government support and significant investments, aiming to become a key global player. The India Semiconductor Mission, with a Rs 76,000 crore budget, drives manufacturing, design, and R&D. Approved projects from major companies like Tata and Micron will boost chip production.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/semiconductor-mission-india-steps-up-chip-drive-revolution-gathers-pace-with-major-investments-talent-push/articleshow/123077228.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/semiconductor-mission-india-steps-up-chip-drive-revolution-gathers-pace-with-major-investments-talent-push/articleshow/123077228.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 20:07:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="205499" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077447,imgsize-205499.cms"/></item><item><title>Assault on Spicejet staff: Army takes note; 'cooperating with probe'</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/srinagar-airport-ruckus-army-officer-assaults-spicejet-staff-over-baggage-fee-army-says-committed-to-discipline-cooperating-with-probe/articleshow/123077611.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/srinagar-airport-ruckus-army-officer-assaults-spicejet-staff-over-baggage-fee-army-says-committed-to-discipline-cooperating-with-probe/articleshow/123077611.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 20:25:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAURABH SINHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="767206" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077651,imgsize-767206.cms"/></item><item><title>India ignores Trump threat: No order to refiners to stop buying Russian oil, claims report</title><description><![CDATA[Despite US pressure and potential penalties, India has not directed its oil refiners to halt Russian crude purchases, prioritizing energy security and diplomatic ties. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>'Rahul Gandhi is anti-India': Himanta Biswa Sarma's fresh jibe at Congress MP</title><description><![CDATA[Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma launched a scathing attack on Rahul Gandhi, branding him "anti-national" and accusing him of supporting Bangladeshi and Pakistani Muslims. The dropped catch and Brook's innings became a defining moment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-dropped-and-punished-how-many-runs-did-harry-brook-score-after-mohammed-sirajs-miss/articleshow/123077230.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-dropped-and-punished-how-many-runs-did-harry-brook-score-after-mohammed-sirajs-miss/articleshow/123077230.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 20:19:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="86062" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077236,imgsize-86062.cms"/></item><item><title>Tejashwi's dual voter ID row: EC issues notice to RJD leader, asks him to hand over EPIC card</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission has issued a notice to RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav regarding discrepancies in his EPIC numbers. She and Dwyane Wade welcomed their daughter, Kaavia, via surrogacy in 2018. Union had previously experienced miscarriages.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 00:31:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1290157" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123050873,imgsize-1290157.cms"/></item><item><title>Dak Prescott builds new mansion after tearing down previous one: Here's why</title><description><![CDATA[Dallas Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott is rebuilding his Texas mansion in Prosper, aiming for a more contemporary and intimate design. The new structure, featuring clean lines and compartmentalized segments, appears to be a luxurious, multi-story residence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/revealed-dak-prescotts-new-mansion-construction-heres-why-the-cowboys-qb-tore-down-his-last-mansion/articleshow/123076541.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/revealed-dak-prescotts-new-mansion-construction-heres-why-the-cowboys-qb-tore-down-his-last-mansion/articleshow/123076541.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 18:42:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="501085" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076574,imgsize-501085.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Thousands of Palestine supporters 'March for Humanity' in Sydney</title><description><![CDATA[Thousands of pro-Palestine supporters rallied in Sydney. The demonstration followed government signals of potential recognition of a Palestinian state. Organizers accused Israel of genocide. The protest highlighted calls for a ceasefire and unrestricted humanitarian assistance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-thousands-of-palestine-supporters-march-for-humanity-in-sydney-demand-gaza-aid-sanctions-on-israel/articleshow/123077191.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-thousands-of-palestine-supporters-march-for-humanity-in-sydney-demand-gaza-aid-sanctions-on-israel/articleshow/123077191.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 19:45:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4210041" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077231,imgsize-4210041.cms"/></item><item><title>Joe Root breaks massive record; becomes first to achieve feat against India</title><description><![CDATA[Joe Root's resilient half-century on Day 4 of the fifth Test against India at The Oval bolstered England's chase, equaling Herbie Taylor's record with 16 fifty-plus scores against an opponent in home Tests.       <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <title><![CDATA[RBI won the battle against inflation, but the war continues: Sanjay Malhotra]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/rbi-won-the-battle-against-inflation-but-the-war-continues-sanjay-malhotra-19642331.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Consumer inflation in India has continuously eased for the last eight months, falling to 2.1% in June 2025 which is the lowest level since January 2019. ]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The India-UK Free Trade Agreement will open up new manufacturing opportunities for British firms in India and is expected to more than double bilateral trade to $120 billion over the next five years, said Sunil Bharti Mittal, Chairman of Bharti Enterprises.
